attributes.action: demand that the detention centre at Guantánamo Bay is immediately closed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To publicly show that he supports Human Rights, to publicly condemn that the US detention centre at Guantánamo Bay exists, to acknowledge that the torture conducted there by the USA is unlawful and to publicly demand that the detention centre at Guantánamo Bay is immediately closed.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
